thread.title: What would you do w/ a billion dollars?
thread.title_full: What would you do w/ a billion dollars?

author: Sabcat
title: What would you do w/ a billion dollars?
text: What would you do w/ a billion dollars? I'd bet my wife my half she couldn't stay off the phone for an hour. There's no way she's taking it. Quote: Originally Posted by Fayt I also would donate my money to a politician that believe that you all billions should be taxed at 90%. Finally I see some good logic. Although I disagree with 90%. I think it should be 100%. But, I can see you are on the right path! Once people begin to understand that they are part of a group and collective and can dismiss this notion of individualism, then the sooner we can begin to achieve greatness as a society.
